name: In space (itch) (PitiGameDev)
description:
In Space is a 2D top-down Arena Shooter where you are on an alien planet, and you have to survive to a horde of alien creatures that want your blood



The rules are simple: you have to survive for 15 minutes (or 10, if you want to play the game on easy...) killing as many enemies as you can


You have your Space Rifle with you, but you can gain experience points from your defeated enemies and buy new power-ups



If you cannot beat the game, do not worry: you can buy permanent power-ups for you character in the Shop Menu, and become more powerful.



So are you ready for this?

The game is in Early Access, buying the game now you get:

  • One Stage
  • Incremental difficulty
  • Two game modes: Easy and Normal
  • more than 30 different power-ups
  • 12 different monsters to fight with
  • A shop where you can upgrade your character stats

The Final Version of the game will feature:

  • Up to 5 stages
  • Bosses
  • Steam Achievements
  • Unlockable Pre-rendered Artworks and short FMV
  • Other 4 Enemies[
  • New Power-ups
  •  Hard Game Mode

The game is actually on Early Access.

Here you will find what I plan to do in the future:

  • Multiple Stages to choose from 
  • New Power-ups 
  •  A third game mode (hard mode)
  • Different Bosses
  •  New Creatures
  •  Expanded soundtrack
  • Unlockable game's artworks
  • Some short FMV animation
  • Mac-Os version

You can purchase the game on Steam too. 

If you buy the game here on itch.io you can contact me to receive a steam key for free.
